Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@tag390g 
```
update to latest version: 0.5.7-4
go to %appdata%
find the Komodo folder
Enter it

delete the following files/folders

blocks
chainstate
notarisations
komodostate
komodostate.ind
peers.dat

DO NOT delete wallet.dat
back it up

download https://bootstrap.dexstats.info/KMD-bootstrap.tar.gz
Extract the bootstrap file to the Komodo folder in %appdata%
```

Author: BlackMarket#6984
Content: Good Morning, I had a question for Komodo Devs here, Have the PrePackaged Windows Binaries Been Compiled Yet For HempCoin THC?

Author: BlackMarket#6984
Content: The windows wallet binaries have to be prepackaged in linux, then updated on the KMD github. There was a pull request, and a beta fix was created, but it has to be approved by KMD before it can become an official release.

Author: BlackMarket#6984
Content: The windows users over at hempcoin would be very greatful if you guys can check this out 😎

Author: scotts#5859
Content: My Agama Wallet repeatedly gets stuck activating best chain upon opening , despite throwing away everything in the komodo application support folder as you recommend. It will open to around 98-99% and the information  about my komodo tokens is always correct although not functioning. It opened to 100% once. In addition, when I close or quit Agama, it never re-opens. I get a message: "Error starting KMD daemon. Port 7771 is already taken!"  Can you help?

Author: Mastermind#1578
Content: :PeepoThink:  no one here who can help ?

Author: phm87#7395
Content: @scotts when I have this error msg, usually it means that kmd daemon is already running (or another process is using 7771 port). You should check your process list to make sure kmd is turned off before relaunching it (windows: ctrl alt del. Linux: ps aux | grep komodod     or     htop)

Author: phm87#7395
Content: If you never did this, maybe it is easier yo reboot computer before starting kmd. If ghe issue occurs again, maybe it is another process using 7771 port, we can help you to identify the process

Author: phm87#7395
Content: @Mastermind please make sure you use an uptodate version (I don t know verus wallet versions sorry). In worst case, tufn off kmd, check it is turned off (see my msg here above to scotts) then delete everything in .komodo folder except wallet.dat (make a secure backup of it). Then restart the sync. You can download and "unzip" (in .komodo folder) a bootstrap to save some hours

Author: phm87#7395
Content: https://dexstats.info/bootstrap.php

Author: Mastermind#1578

Content: Use a bootstrap it can be quick.

Author: phm87#7395
Content: Yeah it is the reorg stuff. It can be quicker to use the param and restart wallet instead of downloading everything

Author: phm87#7395
Content: @nick21 I think you can stop the wallet then restart it with this param https://discordapp.com/channels/412898016371015680/459072527323365390/601368753325735936

Author: phm87#7395
Content: If it does not work, you can do as @Mastermind did but be careful to backup securely wallet.dat (after wallet stopped). It can take a while but it can be speeded up with a bootstrap that you download then "untar", see explanations and links above

Author: phm87#7395
Content: A similar problem is discussed in #wallet-ocean-qt  : jl777 suggested to start with -maxreorg=300 https://discordapp.com/channels/412898016371015680/459072527323365390/608010506690625546
